snippet: KLUGER--Arthur, 81, on December 30, 2015. Beloved husband of Susan, devoted father of David, Dan and Hannah. Adored grandfather of Sarah, Jackson, Ella and Georgia. Funeral service private; celebration of his life to be announced. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLUGER--Arthur, 81, on December 30, 2015. Beloved husband of Susan, devoted father of David, Dan and Hannah. Adored grandfather of Sarah, Jackson, Ella and Georgia. Funeral service private; celebration of his life to be announced. 1/3
